T02D3457:112b-1: sarba satva ba sh'i ka ra na sa m'a dhi /
T02D3457:112b-3: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
T02D3457:112b-4: 'jam dpal mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3457:112b-5: stong pa nyid bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas zla
T02D3457:112b-6: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ho:yig las bdag nyid
T02D3457:112b-7: bskyed de / chags pa chen po'i gzugs dkar dmar
T02D3457:112b-8: sgeg pa'i nyams 'bar ba rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs
T02D3457:112b-9: bskyed de / pa / zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3457:112b-12: g-yas gur gum ltar dmar ba /
T02D3457:112b-13: rgyab padma r'a ga ltar dmar ba /
T02D3457:112b-15: rtsa ba'i phya gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02D3457:112b-16: phyi ma dag gis zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D3457:112b-17: de bzhin du phyi ma dag gis shes rab kyi
T02D3457:112b-18: pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang ral gri
T02D3457:112b-19: bsnams pa / yang de bzhin du phyi ma dag gis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D3457:112b-20: de bzhin du cod pan dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3457:112b-21: cod pan las 'od zer byung ste steng du song
T02D3457:112b-22: nas snang bar byas te mchog gi dmar po chen
T02D3457:113a-1: gi phyogs rnams su gnas pa rnams la dang po
T02D3457:113a-2: dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i 'od
T02D3457:113a-3: zer gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gang nas rjes su
T02D3457:113a-4: chags pas rang gi dbang du gnas par yid kyis
T02D3457:113a-5: bsams nas de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3457:113a-6: aom ma h'a r'a ga badzra r'a ga ya sarba
T02D3457:113a-7: satva na ho:de nas sems can thams cad nges par
T02D3457:113a-8: dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i nges pa shin tu
T02D3457:113a-9: bsgoms pas chags pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku'i mchog
